column1: '''Mámandil''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "friend of [[sheep]]" and possibly also "shepherd".
Mámandil was the pseudonym of [[Hallacar]] of [[Hyarastorni]] while he wooed [[Tar-Ancalimë
column2: Ancalimë]] on the pastoral lands of [[Emerië]].<ref>{{UT
AD}}, p. 395</ref> and ''[[-ndil]]'' "friend of, devoted to".
